A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Worst star wars movie of all time. I felt like walking out\,  but I just had to see how it was going to end.  Luke just dissapears... It seems Disney is so PG they can't even let a Jedi die\, he has to disappear for no reason. So many plot holes it's unbelievable. Rose was a pretty lame character. Humor was bad.  Reminded me of a rip off of the Cylon from Battlestar Galactica  who also does maintenance on the ship. She stops Finn from saving everyone... seriously...
